alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 15 at 4:26PM MST until March 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... Northwestern Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Southeastern Imperial County in southeastern California... * Until 500 PM MST/500 PM PDT/. * At 426 PM MST/426 PM PDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Algodones Dunes, or 18 miles northwest of Somerton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Martinez Lake and Algodones Dunes. This includes CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 80 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
